website_summaries.verdict: Rather than charging in  light, this football features impact-activated LEDs, so it glows from the inside.
pros: Lights up instantly with smart LED bulbs inside
Shuts off when not in use
A good size for teen hands
Easy to install new batteries when the old ones fail
cons: Battery compartment affects the weight, so it does not throw like a standard football
May arrive deflated, so have a pump on hand

customer_reviews.title: Before I could get it wrapped for Christmas the light ...
customer_reviews.text: Before I could get it wrapped for Christmas the light went out, so my husband followed the directions to replace the batteries and one of the batteries exploded in his face as he was removing it from the battery holder. So scary! Not sure if this is an isolated incident or not, but it could have ended badly.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Smith

customer_reviews.title: A decent football but lacks the glow.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good football but glows nothing like the picture shows. I was expecting a football that glowed as much as the product description but this was not the case. This football is about half as luminant as the picture. My husband and son have enjoyed the football in the backyard; but I was disappointed in that it didn't glow as I thought it would.
customer_reviews.author: A. Whitfield

customer_reviews.title: So fun!!
customer_reviews.text: We love this football!! Great quality and a ton of fun at night time. The only bummer is the higher price tag, but perhaps I just don't know much about the value of footballs, ha! And just an FYI, it comes deflated. I didn't realize that. But no biggie, hubby took it to work and had it inflated in the maintenance department. UPDATE: 9 months later the battery compartment and housing are all severely corroded. I am not sure this football will ever light up again. Would love a replacement if possible
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Ann

customer_reviews.title: I'm disappointed to give this a poor review
customer_reviews.text: I'm disappointed to give this a poor review. I was looking forward to the product. It came barely functioning as it was using batteriesduring shipment. In less than a day, the batteries were out. After purchasing batteries that total nearly the price of the product I attempted to install them. It does not work. Therefore we have a decent small football that does not light up. A football with irregularities in weight that prevent it from perfect spirals. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Saft

customer_reviews.title: Pick something else
customer_reviews.text: Ball weight is wonky because of the light, you cant give a decent throw with this. Plus the light is nothing like the picture. Its very dim and light is concentrated only by the little bulb. Would not recommend this piece of trash
customer_reviews.author: Josie

customer_reviews.title: Great for night games
customer_reviews.text: It lights up extremely well and is great for playing after dark! The light stays on long enough to be thrown and caught, and is easy to get to light up again. The battery compartment can be a bit of a pain to get to, but I'd rather have that than have it fall out. My only complaint is that despite indicating their interest in using it prior to my purchase, my friends no longer want to play after dark. Still, I don't regret this purchase and will gladly hold onto it in hopes that one day my friends will want to play, or I'll find friends that aren't such babies.
customer_reviews.author: Avril

customer_reviews.title: The ball looks dirty. Even though it arrived in inflated
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 little boys. This is not the first football I've ordered and surely will not be the last. The ball looks dirty. Even though it arrived in inflated, it looks like that this thing has been through a 12 week tackle season with my oldest. It came dirty
customer_reviews.author: Pikey

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Got the first ball and it malfunctioned after the first drop. Sent an email to the company after they asked how the produce was working out, explained the situation and the sent a replacement immediately. My teenage boys love this ball. They play with it all the time. It's a hit. Love the customer service and prompt response to a malfunctioning product. Going to order the basketball next!!
customer_reviews.author: ZandM

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed! Leaks!
customer_reviews.text: Air leaks out of the battery compartment. I tried many times to fix it, but it starts to deflate once we throw it. Very disappointed. Will be returning and not reordering.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Durable, perfect light up football
customer_reviews.text: Our family has enjoyed taking a walk at night and tossing a ball back and forth. We absolutely love this product. It glows perfectly and inflates to a regulation ball feel. It does come deflated so, you will need to pump it up. It comes with a tool extra batteries to replace the ones included in the ball. We have had ours for a month, use it nightly for a consistent 20 minutes and have not had to replace the batteries yet. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: momlandrs

customer_reviews.title: Crazy bright and so much fun
customer_reviews.text: A Christmas gift for a sporty-type teen, this was a hit. It’s no more complicated to get going than a regular football (it arrives deflated), its standard size, weight, and texture mean there’s no acclimation to get the game going. A fun, unusual gift that’s perfect to keep things going well after dark. Comes with replacement batteries, lights up on touch and turns off after about 90 seconds of no touch.
customer_reviews.author: mavenmags

customer_reviews.title: WOW, IT'S BRIGHT
customer_reviews.text: BETTER THAN EXPECTED !!! I wish I had taken a picture of the kids playing with this GlowCity light up football while we were camping this past weekend. They loved it. Other campers were asking where I bought it because it was so bright. After reading some of the reviews I was a little worried it wouldn't be that great but i'm glad I ordered it anyway because it's better than I expected. Would highly recommend and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: jfleeno

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Excellent customer service. We messed the first one up by using an air needle that was to large. Unfortunately tire plugs don't work that well on footballs. GlowCity wrote me asked me how I liked the product and I told them about our mishap. They didn't have to, but they sent me a new football. Once I get a chance to deliver this to the church youth group, I will let you know about the football. All I can say is GlowCity's customer service was excellent. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: Most things you see ads for that look cool, you buy and then they turn out to be a waste of money. This ball is so awesome that this is my second purchase of the same ball (the first one I bought 5 years ago and is still working perfectly)! I bought a second so we could take both on a campout with a large group of boys. They LOVED it!! Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: MELANIE J BURNS

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. Don’t waste your money. Bought this and the basketball for our kids for Christmas. The basketball arrived defective with the light up feature not working so had to get a replacement. The football worked initially but now two months after purchasing, and after the return window has closed, the light up feature no longer works. If we just wanted to give our boys a regular football and basketball we would’ve purchased a better quality ball. This was purchased solely for the light up feature and that doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Huge hit for the althetic boys in my life
customer_reviews.text: In an age where kids get lost in technology, it's nice to see my nephews really enjoying these light up balls. I've given a variety of them (the basketball, soccer ball, football) as gifts and hear back from their parents that it's something they're still enjoying months later. Definitely a great choice. Bought one for my niece -- Meh. But that might have been different if she was really into sports.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Buy this football because you will love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant about buying this football for my grandson who just turned 13 after reading some of the reviews. This football is super fun! No problem inflating, it took all of a minute. It glows so bright and It feels really good in your hand and the quality is great..... Don't listen to the poor reviews!! I live in Colorado and even if it was 40 degrees tonight all the boys were out in the driveway passing this bright orange football in the dark!! Very fitting since the Broncos just won the Super Bowl !!!
customer_reviews.author: jan

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME night time football!
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased the GlowCity basketball for a Christmas gift for my youngest son and because it was hit bought the football for my oldest son for Easter. Both products are ultra bright, durable and tons of fun! Highly Recommend! Can you please make a kickball - we play four square in the driveway.
customer_reviews.author: Teri C.

customer_reviews.title: Really cool design and concept I like playing with this in ...
customer_reviews.text: Really cool design and concept I like playing with this in the car. Its really bright and you can for sure see it in the dark. The only bad thing I have to say about this is that the place where the battery is at sticks out a little so you can hit your finger on it but I don't really have too much of a problem with it. It's not too annoying where it's not usable.
customer_reviews.author: andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great durable gift.
customer_reviews.text: The kids have loved playing with this football at night! It is bright, has kept air in well & also comes with extra batteries and a tool to help with replacing them. So far it has stood up to some pretty intense teen football nights & we have not had to reinflate it. Happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Co-winky dink

customer_reviews.title: Worth it! Mom of teen football players approved
customer_reviews.text: My kids have sooo many footballs, this was the perfect gift! We often have a mess of kids in the yard after dark playing ball but they always have to switch to soccer after dark because they cant see even the glow in the dark balls. This one is perfect, it lights up w impact and stays on for a few minutes after it is put away. My teens love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift For My Grsndson
customer_reviews.text: I give the football 5 stars. I had read where it was not inflated when it arrives, and that was not a problem to me. I went ahead and ordered extra batteries for the football and also the lighted frisbee I had ordered as well. My husband and I kept turning it on and off at night, so figured I would get them since this is going to be a Christmas gift. Brett, the owner is very polite and responds very quickly to any questions or concerns you may have. I would definitely order again and have actually done so. Happy Customer.
customer_reviews.author: F Blevins

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: so fun! The kids could no wait for the sun to go down to play with the ball. Perfect gift for the kid who, literally, has everything. Be prepared that it comes deflated, so have an air pump handy
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: This is a fun football for throwing around at night!
customer_reviews.text: The ball comes deflated, so have a needle and pump handy. Batteries are already installed, which is great. Loads of spare batteries and a wrench to extract the battery case to replace and change batteries. The kids loved throwing this around. It lights up bright enough to play in pitch darkness. Very durable and easy to throw, maybe because it a smaller than regulation size, I think. This will last a long time!
customer_reviews.author: John C. Lin

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for my nephew!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my nephew (10 yrs old) as a birthday gift! He lived it! Was easy to inflate! Battery was included. Durable seems to be made of exact same material regular balls are! We had so much fun at night with this! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Renee F

customer_reviews.title: Needle Valve Leaked Immediately
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased one of these balls before in the past and the light basically fell out after little use. Appears they have improved the design of how the light is mounted so that everything is captured securely. There is a piece floating around inside the ball which was there when I received it but the light still functions properly, no issues there really other than the noise. However, Immediately after the ball was inflated it began leaking from the rubber needle valve, no way to stop it.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Beam

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't go out super quick like other glow balls we have had
customer_reviews.text: Ball really glows! It doesn't go out super quick like other glow balls we have had. You actually have time to catch it first. The only negative is it is kind of heavy for a football. My son doesn't play with it as much as the other glow city balls because of that reason. He likes the soccer ball and basketball best.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Has anyone seen my batteries?
customer_reviews.text: It's a simple ball that glows. Unfortunately, the manufacturer doesn't seem to be concerned with keeping the batteries inside the ball. Threw the ball half a dozen times with my son, then spent 15 minutes looking for the battery cover. You'll need to put a piece of tape over the battery plug. Ball also requires a pretty solid smack in order to illuminate and requires this impact to stay illuminated. Nothing like tossing a 30 yard bomb that goes off mid flight, rendering the ball invisible just before it bounces off my kids face.
customer_reviews.author: The Reed House

customer_reviews.title: doesn't hold air very long. have keep pumping it every 20-30 min.
customer_reviews.text: this was a hit my 9yo son and his friends because we can play football late into the night. This ball lights up very well and is very easy to see at night. the only down side is that it does not hold air very long. have to keep pumping it up every 20-30 min
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great buy. Every person should have one of these ...
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. Every person should have one of these in the trunk of their car. Smaller than NFL size but okay because item matches the description. We play catch in the middle of the night with exception of few street lights.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin P

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I thought because of the cost and reviews that this would be a decent gift to give. But now I'm stuck without a gift because this is nothing better than what you can get from a dollar store.
customer_reviews.author: Wickedmaryjane

customer_reviews.title: Great for a game of night ball!
customer_reviews.text: My son chose this for his birthday because he doesn't like coming inside when it gets dark! This worked out perfect for a game of football with his friends during a bonfire we had for his team. When it got dark, it didn't stop them from playing because they could still see the ball! Great quality and fun product!!
customer_reviews.author: ccxthree

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son and both he and I really like this. It’s light so it’s easier to throw for the smaller kids and the light it has is strong and really makes the whole thing glow. As far as durability, it seems to be good. We’ve used it many times to play on the street and as many times as it’s hit the asphalt there is no damage other than a few scratches. Would def recommend this product. We’ve had many night time games and hope to have many more
customer_reviews.author: Rodrigo Lozada

customer_reviews.title: Nothing but Love!
customer_reviews.text: It's very durable! It's gotten wet and beat up just like a normal foot ball and keeps on Glowing! Great Buy!
customer_reviews.author: That One Guy

customer_reviews.title: Lights up randomly
customer_reviews.text: This ball is sturdy.We just opened it to prep it for Christmas morning. Instructions say that it should light up as soon as you touch/tap it. Hubby had to punch it a few times to get to light up. He tossed it around and gripped it and still didn't light until it was punched. Wish it had worked better because it's nice-looking and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Kiz

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: My boys LOVE this football, the first time we used the glow feature it was a random gorgeous day in the winter and they played with new friends at the park until dark and this thing was a life saver! Everyone wanted to know where we got it!! Would so recommend this!! We want to try the basketball one too!
customer_reviews.author: Liz Williams

customer_reviews.title: I got a bad one
customer_reviews.text: Got a bad one compared to other kids in the neighborhood. It barely lights up. Tried to replace battery thinking that maybe batteries were dead from shipping and the battery holder broke trying to get batteries out. Maybe I’ll try again if it goes on sale because other kids have these in the neighborhood and it looks awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Big

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material
customer_reviews.text: On the second day there is a plug or a hole on the football that holds the battery or the LED light it just came off , I gave it as a gift and it makes me feel that I bought crap , won't buy again..
customer_reviews.author: Eric Q

customer_reviews.title: OH MY GOSH!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't figure out how worked. Was flat and didn't blow up. I returned the 2 Basket balls with this RMA. I wasn't able to print label
customer_reviews.author: Julia 33417

customer_reviews.title: Great Family Fun
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my son to play catch in the back yard at night. I was so much fun the entire family got into the game. Light works great and turns off when you stop using it. We have only had it a few weeks, so we will see how it holds up. The ball comes with a extra batteries and a removal tool.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Great football for nighttime training/use
customer_reviews.text: Great ball for nighttime use. Definitely not the same as a regulation leather football but it’s perfect for using at night and it holds up well against water since it’s rubber.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle R.

customer_reviews.title: May get more!
customer_reviews.text: It is outstanding!! Everyone likes it!! Glows perfect in the dark!! They will not stop emailing you till you give them a review!!! Evey day for a week!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Lancaster

customer_reviews.title: Great idea
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great idea except the plug for the batteries kept falling out and eventually went missing. Then the light goes out after a while of playing and you hit the ball to light it up before you throw it, in mid flight the light goes out and you have to make the best of it a catch it when you can hardly see
customer_reviews.author: Puna Enos

customer_reviews.title: It was a win
customer_reviews.text: Was given as a gift to my step son. He LOVED it. Said it felt like a real football and he and my son played after dark outside forever. One of his favorite birthday gifts this year.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Great gift, everyone should own one
customer_reviews.text: Such a great idea! Makes playing at night more enjoyable when you can actually see the ball! We have the basketball too and these are great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Nice idea~
customer_reviews.text: This caught my attention, but once I got it, it was hard to open the tab to put the batteries in. Don't think I'll purchase again. :(
customer_reviews.author: Darcy

customer_reviews.title: Flat football
customer_reviews.text: For $22 you would think the football would be inflated. At least the description could have indicated that a pump would be required.
customer_reviews.author: Jwaddell

customer_reviews.title: Bright and lasts
customer_reviews.text: I bought this football 2 years ago, it still gets played with regularly. It still lights up. The kids (and adults) have fun with this at night. Ours lights up very well, the whole thing lights up way better than I expected after reading some of the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: wickschick

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Great for at night but not as durable as real football. Still worked and lasted over a year but we only play football at night during bon fires.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Glossop

customer_reviews.title: Kids approved
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old loves it. He is always playing football with the neighbor kid at night so this works perfectly so they can see
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Hutchins

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: This is a great football. It may not be regulation but our kids love it especially to play outside in the dark. We also bought the basketball and my older son loves that very much
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Save your Mony this is the worst product I bought from amazon The ball did not glow there was no led or battery device installed in the ball. Very disappointed !!!
customer_reviews.author: Charles leahey jr

customer_reviews.title: nice football
customer_reviews.text: It worked perfect for first half hour the it started blinking off and on.. the batteries were dying already? I don't know i really like it, just wish it lasted longer. I guess I'll put the extra batteries it came with in it and see what happens. It is hard to get the batteries in it 😒
customer_reviews.author: Duke4life

customer_reviews.title: A great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This product line is awesome. Great for the backyard, camping, parties, or whatever. You can’t go wrong with these!
customer_reviews.author: Hank D

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: It’s a Christmas present for my ten-years-old son. It’s a bit big for him and can not be caught as easily as a regular one. Hope it will be good next year. And it’ nice to provide spare battery.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine he

customer_reviews.title: would like a exchange
customer_reviews.text: I got the package box was in excellent condition I did what the instructions said to do and plz believe me I honestly think this was a fluke the flow football didn't work I'm not mad things like this happen time to time so I sent it back and I would just like to have another one exchange I got the refund all good believe me I will still shop here love the products thank you
customer_reviews.author: Jerri B.

customer_reviews.title: Do not give as a gift
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say anything about the quality of the football but we were planning on giving it as a Xmas gift and it just came in a plastic bag instead of a box. There are also no instructions. We’ll see how it goes but this may be a returned item.
customer_reviews.author: km1979

customer_reviews.title: Kids Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it better than the glow basketball. Came with extra batteries. Don’t expect similar quality as higher cost regular footballs. More of a cool novelty that is functional. Unknown how long it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Tidal creek

customer_reviews.title: looks cool but very poor quality wouldn’t recommend throwing your money
customer_reviews.text: I went to blow it up with a hand pump, stuck the needle in started pumping and the rubber piece you install the needle to inflate pushed inside the football. Never got to use cheap toy and lost out on money, looks cool but very poor quality wouldn’t recommend throwing your money away
customer_reviews.author: BRENT

customer_reviews.title: Great idea and wonderful at first but the light doesn't ...
customer_reviews.text: Great idea and wonderful at first but the light doesn't stay bright for all too long. Is there any way to replace the light? I don't think so
customer_reviews.author: Cindy F.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old son loves this! Bright glow at night! Have bought a couple of these now for gifts also.
customer_reviews.author: Casey A Literski

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome and bright! Perfect for playing outside when the sun goes down at 5pm in the winter.
customer_reviews.author: wendi jordan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for your football enthusiast!
customer_reviews.text: How awesome is it to be able to play football at night!! It is a great football even during the day but it is fabulous to see it light up at night and get an extra hour of play time in the front yard!
customer_reviews.author: Krysten

customer_reviews.title: Awesome football for the kids
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for trip to the beach for my kids to play with at night. It stayed illuminated and the kids loved it.
customer_reviews.author: J Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great guy gift!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item to be shipped out of state to my great grandson for a birthday gift. He is pre-teen and loves playing with it in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: phyllis cowart

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful for our 8 year old grandson, especially when it gets dark and he still wants to play.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisB

customer_reviews.title: Kids having a blast playing ball after dark!
customer_reviews.text: Kids having a blast ball after dark. Ball was deflated on arrival, which I understand for warehouse storage. Once I blew it up, had to check it out for myself. Smack ball against hand lights it up. Ball came with instructions and an tool to use to replace battery. Not sure who is having more with this, my husband or the grandkids!
customer_reviews.author: Angie Wilder

customer_reviews.title: Fun in the dark!
customer_reviews.text: A bit thrown off that the ball is deflated when it arrives but easy enough to inflate so be sure you have/get a pump. Excellent for the kids to play into the darkness with.... great feature that the ball detects whether or not it's being used so the LEDs shut off when it's not!
customer_reviews.author: EAC

customer_reviews.title: This ball is a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This ball is a waste of money. It would not stay inflated and the glow is not bright at all. It doesn't glow anything like the picture and description lead you to believe. It is overpriced and poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Shalappy

customer_reviews.title: Great fun!
customer_reviews.text: My son keeps this in his car so it's always handy when he's around his friends - a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: FLMomOfTwinBoys

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a freakin' meteor rocketing across the yard
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a freakin' meteor rocketing across the yard. It's awesome. Very bright, easy to see. good feel and weight also -just like a regular football (youth size).
customer_reviews.author: snakedawg

customer_reviews.title: Keep throwing when the sun goes down.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Product was more expensive than a typical football, but the ability to use it at night made it unique. Very bright in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: A. Crate

customer_reviews.title: Lasts
customer_reviews.text: All the boys play football at night in the backyard. This has lasted all winter and it’s great that you can change the batteries!
customer_reviews.author: Charli

customer_reviews.title: Fun exercize in the dark!
customer_reviews.text: My son and husband play just about every night. It's fun to watch and the ball is easy to find!
customer_reviews.author: Sean C.

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: My boys love this ... And they are young teens. Also bought for my nephew who is 8 and he loves it. Reviewers who state defective should note that they have excellent customer service. I got the basketball to and the area where the pump pin would go in fell into the ball. Brett, from Glow City, promptly sent another ball.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We love this! Its perfect for night time football with the boys.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Best football ever...for night use.
customer_reviews.text: Best football ever. Amazing customer service. When it gets dark out we use this alot. Blows any glow in the dark ball out of the water. Worth every penny. It is super bright and easy to catch.
customer_reviews.author: Made in 'Merica

customer_reviews.title: Fun new ball
customer_reviews.text: This ball is a fun addition to our home. We like to hang outside in the evenings and now we have a football to toss around that we can see in the dark. It comes deflated so you will need to inflate it, but it does come with a battery installed and a replacement for when it is needed.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: functional
customer_reviews.text: We played in the park this week and after a few snaps we had to add air. And after awhile it was low again. It does work well in the night the light is just the ticket for a youth group and evening games.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Buy It!
customer_reviews.text: Best Christmas present I could have purchased for my nephew. Batteries are easily replaced and makes for an easy transition of a game into the evening. That disappointment of having to end the fun because no one can see where the ball is being thrown is nonexistent now. Awesome fun!
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: Very cool
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for family to play together at night. Works shockingly well. Many people asked where we found this football. Will be giving as gifts in future.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Paul

customer_reviews.title: Summer Nights just got FUN!
customer_reviews.text: Works awesome at night, it is a little hard to get the light out to put batteries in but overall worth the Fun.
customer_reviews.author: Scott B.

customer_reviews.title: Game Changing
customer_reviews.text: Took these camping. These are AMAZING when wilderness camping in the dark. Put a glow stick around your neck and play catch in the dark for the first time. It will change your life.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to like this football
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this football. It glows great that is for a couple hours max. It comes with cheap tiny little batteries and it died before we could even finish playing with it the night we got it. I bought different little batteries and it didn't last long at all. If they could figure out how to make the glow last more than 1 or 2 hours it would he awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Tanner

customer_reviews.title: Bright glow ball! Easy to activate!!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love to play with this outside in the dark!
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: FUN
customer_reviews.text: Super fun! I had a similar glow football when I was younger and wanted to get my son something similar for his Christmas gift. It comes deflated. It turns on with impact and times off in 10-15 seconds. It lights up very well, highly visible. It also comes with extra batteries and a tool to open the battery cavity.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Hannasch

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Good ball but don’t glo as good as I expected
customer_reviews.author: Ms C

customer_reviews.title: Looks great using it at night
customer_reviews.text: It a very cool gift and it works well. The kids live it. I am surprised at how durable it is. No problems with it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Rapp14

customer_reviews.title: Glowing Football
customer_reviews.text: The product is great. Nice size football, lights up really well. My grandson, his friends and my adult son are all having a blast playing football at night, just to see it glow.
customer_reviews.author: DebbieDo

customer_reviews.title: Grandboys
customer_reviews.text: Grandboys played with them today in the front yard and had a blast!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this football so far love it at night glows awesome some
customer_reviews.author: Joe P

customer_reviews.title: Love this item so much I have bought probably 4 ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this item so much I have bought probably 4 or 5 of them. My 8 year old loves it to play when outside as its getting dark and then I buy for all the 9 year old birthday parties he is invited to. It was super fun when we took on our beach vacation to play at night.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the lights
customer_reviews.text: Bought for grandkids. They love the lights. Seem durable and fun to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jane Dundon

customer_reviews.title: Ball is awesome
customer_reviews.text: The ball is awesome, it is very durable, no complaints. Very easy to see at night. only thing is you should buy replacement batteries which are very cheap here on Amazon and they give u a lot. Customer service was A+ they sent me a new ball with 2 day shipping
customer_reviews.author: Mark C.

customer_reviews.title: we feel it works great!
customer_reviews.text: This is what I was looking for. My family & I find ourselves throwing a football around in the dark where light isn't adequate. This football has allowed us to spend lots of quality & enjoyable time together doing so, we feel it works great!
customer_reviews.author: FRANK

customer_reviews.title: Will buy more!
customer_reviews.text: Bought and gifted to my 12 year old son. He absolutely loves it!! Now even though my husband gets home late most nights from his job, they can still toss the ball after dark!
customer_reviews.author: John E Luke

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My son and all his friends love this ball. Pretty bright and the battery seems to last.
customer_reviews.author: Jerseyguy

customer_reviews.title: Great product, one hiccup
customer_reviews.text: Awesome concept, ball feels pretty good, but the problem is it some times goes out with no notice and wont kick back on without a good hard hit to it. Makes playing football with my little brother great at night though because I get home from work so late, which is great.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Ohadi

customer_reviews.title: Cool idea with a mehhhhhh response
customer_reviews.text: BE VERY CAREFUL when throwing this in the evening. Your depth perception does not work well at night and the ball will whack you in the face more times than not. The instructions talk about a pump which was not included with the purchase. It came very poorly packaged (flat in a plastic bag) and it seems to be made of mediocre materials. Would I buy it again? Probably not.
customer_reviews.author: Blondie

customer_reviews.title: Bright orange
customer_reviews.text: Me and the kids love playing with this thing at night. When it’s dark, it glows just like the picture. Bright orange.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley johnston

product_meta.title: GlowCity Light Up Football-Official Size-High Bright LED Lights-Perfect Glow in The Dark Football-Extra Batteries Included
feature_bullets: IMPACT ACTIVATED: Football includes one impact activated LED that's located in the center of the ball, when bounced or kicked the LED lights up the entire football in a fiery red/orange Glow. The LED lighting stays on until your finished playing with it and shuts off 30 seconds after use.

BATTERIES INCLUDED: Ready for use, just fill it up with air and prepare to be amazed! 3 pre-installed LR-44 batteries are ready to go inside the Impact Activated LED Fixture. The batteries will last for about 30 constant playing hours before you will need to change the batteries. Batteries are also Replaceable and easy to change with the provided tool.

DURABLE QUALITY: Our Footballs are well made and perfect for night games. You will be amazed how much fun you will have with this Ball playing at night. They can be used indoor or outdoor. Football is a size 6 which is one size larger than a youth football. Our lightup football makes for a great gift for kids and teens of all ages. A great addition to your football training equipment for night time use.

TAKE IT ANYWHERE: Whether it's in your backyard, out camping, or at the beach. This nightball football is a must have for the toy box. Do you have your favorite Primetime NFL game coming up well this a perfect sports ball to bring tailgating. Gather your friends together into teams and get ready for some great football games at night.
FIRST CLASS CUSTOMER SERVICE: GlowCity strives to provide the best customer service to our customers. We provide a 60-day hassle free repair/replace guarantee on all our led sports balls products.
